'''Bongo-Head''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]].

==Profile==
''(To be added.)''

===Personality===
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Bongo-Head takes on the appearance of a [[Floating Hydro Fungus]]. During combat in the event Fabulous Fungus Frenzy, like all Floating Hydro Fungi, Bongo-Head appeared in its Activated state.

{{Quests and Events}}

==Trivia==
* In the Chinese-exclusive Web Event [[Taking Pictures and Recounting Good Times]], Layla and the Traveler visit [[Twirly-Whirly]], Bongo-Head, and [[Blitzara]] on [[Taking_Pictures_and_Recounting_Good_Times/Story/Layla|Layla's birthday in 2022]].
